data.persona: I ride in boats to catch fish. I catch fish in the ocean. I usually get a boat full of fish.
data.description:
You are in the pier walkway.
On the seashore facing the pier, seagulls squawk as they swirl overhead. The smell of salt fills the air, and the gentle, dull roar of the waves lapping the beach is omnipresent. A gentle breeze blows, and the chatter of the villagers fishing drifts down to the shoreline from the pier.
The villager is here.

You are carrying a weights and a broken fishing pole, and wearing a shirt, a cloth, and an knife.
data.goal: give A broken fishing pole to villager

data.short_motivation: I want to prepare to fix the fishing pole
data.mid_motivation: I want to fix the fishing pole for the villager
data.long_motivation: I want to provide excellent services and be known as a fantastic fisherman

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get request and broken fishing pole from villager

timeline.action: get prepared for fixing the fishing pole

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
